channel.title: Whonix Gateway & Workstation vs Whonix Gateway & Windows/Linux VM
channel.description:
Hello, New to this community, And also new to using whonix.
2 questions:
1. Running whonix gateway and windows vm, I have changed the windows vm's settings to internal network and updated the ipv4 parameters to:
IP address: 10.152.152.51 Subnet mask: 255.255.192.0 Default gateway: 10.152.152.10 Preferred DNS server: 10.152.152.10
Am I losing some of the whonix stability/security while using it as described?
2. Any way to use more then 1 windos or linux vm together with that 1 whonix gateway? If I change the same above parameters on a 2nd windows vm, 1 or both often are aborted.
Thank you.

item.title: Whonix Gateway & Workstation vs Whonix Gateway & Windows/Linux VM
item.dc:creator: 2ug
item.description:
Thank you Ego for the informaton and prompt reply.
Have a nice day.

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix Gateway & Workstation vs Whonix Gateway & Windows/Linux VM

item.title: Whonix Gateway & Workstation vs Whonix Gateway & Windows/Linux VM
item.dc:creator: Ego
item.description:
Good day,

regarding the use of a Windows-based-Workstation, please refer to this, there everything, including possible security issues is explained: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Other_Operating_Systems

Furthermore, you may use multiple workstation with one gateway, as explained here: https://www.whonix.org/wiki/Multiple_Whonix-Workstations

Have a nice day,

Ego

Read full topic
item.source: Whonix Gateway & Workstation vs Whonix Gateway & Windows/Linux VM
